home.heroDescription: Born from Taiwan's beloved beef noodle tradition and elevated with Japanese attention to detail, enjoy our 30-year family recipe in your own private pod.

signature.label: OUR SIGNATURE
signature.title: A5 Wagyu Beef Noodle Soup
signature.description: Silky A5 Wagyu beef melts into our rich, aromatic broth — simmered for 48 hours using techniques passed down through three generations. Each bowl tells a story of patience, precision, and passion.

recipe.title: 30-Year Recipe
recipe.description: Perfected beef noodle soup, passed down through generations

beef.title: Premium Beef
beef.description: A5 Wagyu and premium cuts sourced for exceptional quality

tech.title: Tech-First Experience
tech.description: Order ahead, earn rewards, and enjoy seamless service

pods.title: Private Dining Pods
pods.description: Experience dining like never before. Our individual pods offer a peaceful, distraction-free space to savor every slurp. No crowded tables, no noise — just you and your perfect bowl of beef noodle soup.

space.title: Your Space
space.description: Personal pod with ambient lighting and music controls

focus.title: Zero Distractions
focus.description: Focus on your meal without the bustle of traditional dining

fast.title: Fast & Fresh
fast.description: Food delivered directly to your pod, hot and ready

noTipping.title: No Tipping. Ever.
noTipping.description: At Oh!, the price you see is the price you pay. We believe our team deserves fair, stable wages — not unpredictable tips. That's why we pay our kitchen and cleaning staff competitive salaries with benefits.

giveBack.title: Want to Give Back?
giveBack.description: How much power is in a pair of red socks? Let's find out together. Walk with Us™ to support mental health.

customize.label: FRESH INGREDIENTS
customize.title: Customize Your Bowl
customize.description: Choose from hand-pulled noodles, fresh vegetables, and premium toppings to create your perfect bowl.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Something Different?
cta.description: Step into your private pod, savor premium beef noodle soup, and discover why dining at Oh! is unlike anything else.

footer.copyright: © {year} Oh! Beef Noodle Soup. All rights reserved.

foundation.tagline: Support our 501(c)(3) foundation — One Red Step At A Time

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.description: Explore our selection of premium beef noodle soups and accompaniments

soup.subtitle: Start with our signature broth
soup.description: Rich, slow-simmered beef bone broth perfected over 30 years

dessert.subtitle: Sweet endings
dessert.description: Traditional desserts to finish your meal

hero.title: Our Menu
hero.description: Build your perfect bowl with our premium ingredients and 30-year recipe

difference.title: The Oh! Difference
difference.description: We're not just another noodle shop. We're reimagining what dining can be.

techFirst.title: Tech-First Experience
techFirst.description: Order ahead, skip the line, and enjoy a seamless dining experience

privatePods.title: Private Dining Pods
privatePods.description: Enjoy your meal in your own private space, free from distractions

seamlessService.title: Seamless Service
seamlessService.description: From ordering to payment, everything is designed for convenience

loyalty.title: Rewarding Loyalty
loyalty.description: Earn points, unlock rewards, and level up with every visit

cta.title: Ready for the Best Bowl?
cta.description: Order ahead and skip the wait. Your perfect bowl is just a few taps away.

allergen.title: Allergen Information
allergen.description: Our dishes are prepared in a kitchen that handles common allergens including wheat, soy, and eggs. Please inform our staff of any allergies or dietary restrictions when ordering.
allergen.contactUs: For detailed allergen information, please contact us before ordering.

hero.title: Our Locations
hero.description: Experience Oh! Beef Noodle Soup at one of our unique locations

cityCreek.description: Our flagship location in the heart of downtown Salt Lake City, offering a unique dining experience with private pods and tech-forward ordering.
cityCreek.mallDescription: City Creek Center is Utah's premier shopping destination, featuring over 100 stores and restaurants in a stunning open-air setting with a retractable glass roof.
cityCreek.parking: Free parking in City Creek parking structure with validation

universityPlace.description: Serving the Utah Valley community with the same exceptional quality and innovative dining experience.
universityPlace.mallDescription: University Place is Orem's vibrant shopping and entertainment hub, featuring a mix of national retailers and local favorites near Utah Valley University.
universityPlace.parking: Ample free parking available throughout University Place

ohWay.label: The Oh! Way
ohWay.title: A Different Kind of Dining Experience

kiosk.title: Order Your Way
kiosk.description: Skip the line with our mobile app or use our in-store kiosks. Your food is ready when you are.

pod.title: Private Dining Pods
pod.description: Enjoy your meal in your own private space. No crowded tables, no noise — just you and your perfect bowl.

noTips.title: No Tipping Required
noTips.description: The price you see is the price you pay. We pay our team competitive wages so you never have to worry about tips.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: We're expanding! Stay tuned for new locations in these cities.

levelUp.title: Level Up
levelUp.description: Unlock higher tiers for better rewards. The more you visit, the more you save.

redeem.title: Redeem

why.subtitle: The Perfect Gift for Any Occasion

instantDelivery.title: Instant Delivery
instantDelivery.description: Send via email instantly or schedule for a special date

beautifulDesign.title: Beautiful Designs
beautifulDesign.description: Choose from our collection of elegant card designs

neverExpires.title: Never Expires
neverExpires.description: Our gift cards never expire and hold their full value

addMessage.title: Add a Message
addMessage.description: Include a personalized note to make it extra special

corporate.title: Corporate Gift Cards
corporate.description: Reward employees, thank clients, or celebrate milestones with Oh! gift cards. Perfect for any corporate gifting occasion.

delivery.q: How are digital gift cards delivered?
delivery.a: Digital gift cards are sent via email to the recipient. You can choose to send immediately or schedule for a specific date.

multiple.q: Can I use multiple gift cards on one order?
multiple.a: Yes! You can combine multiple gift cards on a single order. Any remaining balance stays on your cards.

expire.a: No, Oh! gift cards never expire. Your balance will always be available whenever you're ready for your next bowl.

balance.q: How do I check my gift card balance?
balance.a: You can check your balance at any Oh! location or by signing into your account online.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.description: Help us reimagine the dining experience. We're building something special and looking for passionate people to join us on this journey.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: These principles guide everything we do, from how we make our soup to how we treat each other.

excellence.title: Excellence in Craft
excellence.description: We obsess over the details. Every bowl, every experience, every interaction matters.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.description: We're building the future of dining. Technology and tradition working in harmony.

team.title: Team Over Ego
team.description: We succeed together. Collaboration, respect, and support are at our core.

growth.title: Growth Mindset
growth.description: We invest in our people. Learn, grow, and advance your career with us.

positions.noFit: Don't see a position that fits?
positions.alwaysLooking: We're always looking for talented people.

meals.title: Free Meals
meals.description: Daily meals during shifts plus family discount

cta.title: Ready to Make Your Mark?
cta.description: Join us in creating the future of dining.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.name: Your Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Thank you! We'll get back to you within 24-48 hours.

social.title: Follow Us
social.description: Stay connected and follow our journey

faq.title: Looking for Quick Answers?
faq.description: Check out our frequently asked questions for instant help.

mediaContact.title: Media Contact
mediaContact.description: For press inquiries, interviews, and media requests, please contact our communications team.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.p1: Oh! Beef Noodle Soup was born from a 30-year family recipe and a vision to reimagine the dining experience. Our founder grew up watching their grandmother perfect her beef noodle soup, serving it to family and friends who couldn't get enough.
ourStory.p2: Today, we're bringing that same recipe to a wider audience, combined with innovative technology and a unique private dining pod concept that puts the focus back on the food and the experience.
ourStory.p3: Our mission is simple: serve the perfect bowl of beef noodle soup in an environment designed for enjoyment, not distraction.

brandAssets.title: Brand Assets

logoPackage.name: Logo Package
logoPackage.description: Primary and secondary logos in various formats

productPhotography.name: Product Photography
productPhotography.description: High-resolution images of our signature dishes

locationPhotos.name: Location Photos
locationPhotos.description: Interior and exterior shots of our locations

brandAssets.requestAccess: To request access to our brand assets, contact

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your information

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Oh! Beef Noodle Soup ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, use our mobile application, or dine at our restaurants.

infoCollect.title: Information We Collect
infoCollect.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us and information that is automatically collected when you use our services.

personalData.title: Personal Data You Provide
items: Name, email address, and phone number
Payment information (processed securely by our payment provider)

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
items: Communicate with you about orders and promotions
Maintain the security of our platform

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We may share your information with:
sharing.serviceProviders: Third parties who help us operate our business (payment processors, delivery services)
sharing.businessPartners: Partners who help us provide services to you
sharing.legalRequirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
sharing.noSell: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:
items: Access the personal data we hold about you

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. You can control cookie settings through your browser.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us:

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We're committed to making Oh! Beef Noodle Soup accessible to everyone.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.content: At Oh! Beef Noodle Soup, we believe everyone deserves to enjoy the perfect bowl of beef noodle soup. We are committed to ensuring our digital platforms and physical locations are accessible to people of all abilities.

website.title: Website Accessibility
website.intro: We strive to ensure our website meets WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards. Our ongoing accessibility efforts include:
items: Keyboard navigation support for all interactive elements

restaurant.title: Restaurant Accessibility
restaurant.intro: Our physical locations are designed with accessibility in mind:
items: Wheelchair accessible entrances and dining areas

ordering.title: Ordering Assistance
ordering.content: If you need assistance placing an order or have questions about our accessibility features, our team is happy to help. Contact us at

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.content: We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of Oh! Beef Noodle Soup. Please let us know if you encounter any accessibility barriers or have suggestions for improvement.

contactUs.title: Contact Us About Accessibility
contactUs.intro: If you have questions or concerns about accessibility, please reach out:
